title: Creating a reusable UIView with xib (and loading from storyboard)
body:
With the huge changes in iOS this QA (like many) is really just of historic interest.

Nowadays everything's just a container view. Container view beginner tutorial

(Indeed Apple finally added Storyboard References, some time ago now, making it far easier.)

Here's a typical storyboard with container views everywhere, everything's a container view.

(KenC's answer shows how you can load an xib to a kind of wrapper view, since you can no longer really "assign to self".)
